page.title: 17OTTERY'S AMENITIES
page.content: provides a minor casualty department and cares for mostly elderly patients. There is a local football club and a cricket club. There are squash courts and a small indoor swimming pool at the Salston Hotel but the fees are very expensive. A new Sports Hall is being built at the Kings School.The town has many other clubs and societies including Guides Scouts Cubs Brownies St.Johns Ambulance, Garden Club Womens Institute Mens Forum and a Youth Club. There is a large garden centre on the outskirts of the town. There is a modern primary school and the Kings School is now the comprehensive school for the area. There is also a convent school. The local factory Ottermill Switchgear employs many people. Fifty years ago Ottery was very different.
